steps.name: Garofalo Penne Pasta
steps.clueText: Our first stop is the heart of Italy! Make your way to the Italy aisle... [short version of chef line]

steps.name: Fresh Spinach
steps.clueText: Head into Jungle Jim’s famous Produce Kingdom and look for fresh spinach leaves...

steps.name: Frozen Chopped Spinach
steps.clueText: From Produce, step into the Frozen Foods caverns and find frozen chopped spinach...

steps.name: Shredded Mozzarella
steps.clueText: Journey to the Dairy Expanse and find Sargento shredded mozzarella in the red bag...

steps.name: Tomato & Basil Pasta Sauce
steps.clueText: Back to the sauce aisle to find Classico Tomato & Basil in its rustic label...

steps.name: Sour Cream
steps.clueText: Stay in Dairy and find the white tub of Daisy Sour Cream with blue and red stripes...

steps.name: Garlic Salt
steps.clueText: Walk into the Spice Aisle and look for Badia Garlic Salt with a garlic picture on the label...

steps.name: Eggs
steps.clueText: Head to the egg section and find the Eggland’s Best white carton with red and blue text...
